title: Public Residences Playgrounds and Furnishings
blurb: Playgrounds for residents of all ages and walks!
description: Public housing blocks boast spaces for residents of all ages and walks of life. When designing playgrounds and public furnishings, weâ€™ve drawn inspiration from history, culture and the environment. From the military-themed play areas of Choa Chu Kang to the nature-flavoured grasshopper slides at Seng Kang, we pay tribute to local icons and sights. Our playgrounds offer inclusive play equipment, catering to children of different abilities. We also provide fitness corners and outdoor furniture to promote active living and social interaction among residents. These spaces encourage community bonding and enhance the overall well-being of the neighbourhood.

title: Champion's Way Playground Offers Fun for Everyone
blurb: Military-themed play areas for kids of all ages.
description: Champion's Way playground offers a military-themed play experience for children of all ages. This public playground features unique play structures designed to inspire imaginative play and physical activity. Kids can explore climbing structures, slides, and interactive elements that promote creativity and social interaction. The playground is designed with safety in mind, featuring soft surfaces and age-appropriate equipment. It's a great place for families to spend quality time together and for children to develop their motor skills and coordination in a fun and engaging environment.

title: 615 Hougang Ave 2 Playground for Family Fun
description: The 615 Hougang Ave 2 playground is a nature-inspired play area featuring grasshopper slides and other unique play structures. Designed for children of various ages, this playground offers a safe and engaging environment for kids to explore and develop their physical skills. The playground includes climbing frames, swings, and interactive elements that promote creativity and social interaction. With its focus on natural themes, the playground provides a refreshing outdoor experience for families and children to enjoy together. It's a great place for kids to have fun and stay active in a safe and stimulating environment.

title: Tampines Street 96 Playground for Active Kids
blurb: Unique playground with climbing and interactive elements.
description: Tampines Street 96 playground offers a dynamic play space for active kids. This playground features a variety of climbing structures, slides, and interactive elements designed to promote physical activity and imaginative play. The playground is designed with safety in mind, featuring soft surfaces and age-appropriate equipment. It's a great place for families to spend quality time together and for children to develop their motor skills and coordination in a fun and engaging environment. The playground provides a stimulating outdoor experience for kids to have fun and stay active.
